entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
